content:
Hey Rust community! Just wanted to say hi. I took a leap a few months back to start using Rust for building web services at the start-up I work for, and I'm loving it. I have been using Warp/SQLx (with Postgres) as well as many other crates in between. I'm currently working on building a platform for integrating data between systems with different JSON schema.

I already recognize a few names on here from SO / Reddit / github / the rust user forums, so I'm pretty psyched to have another source of Rust community wisdom here on Zulip.

Cheers,
Trevor.
